SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Read File & write file : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &START_TOKEN# = "<l7:Bundle>" : SET &END_TOKEN# = "</l7:Bundle>" : SET &PROCESS_FILE_TOKEN# = '<l7:Bundle xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">' : PSET &FILE_NAME# = &UC4RB_APIM_TARGET_BUNDLE# :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(WIN01, &UC4RB_APIM_SOURCE_BUNDLE#) : SET &HND1# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW)
: PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LINE# = STR_TRIM(&LINE#) : IF &LINE# EQ &START_TOKEN# : SET &LINE# = STR_SUB(&LINE#,">",' xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">') : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ELSE : IF &LINE# EQ &PROCESS_FILE_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# GT 0 : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &LINE#) : ENDIF
: IF &LINE# EQ &END_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND1#,&FILE_NAME#,WIN01,LOGIN.WIN01,OVERWRITE) : IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &FILE_NAME#" : ENDIF
: ENDIF :ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND1#
! unwrap selected node :DEFINE &TOKENS#, string, 2 : SET &UNWRAP_TOKEN#=" <l7:Type>,<l7:PolicyType>" :FILL &TOKENS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UNWRAP_TOKEN#,",") : SET &FLAG# = 0
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&TOKENS#[]) :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : p "lEN : &LEN#" : SET &NODE# = "" : SET &START_TOKEN# = &TOKENS#[&VAR#] : SET &START_TOKEN# = STR_TRIM(&START_TOKEN#) : SET &END_TOKEN# = STR_SUB(&START_TOKEN#, "<", "</") : P "START_TOKEN :&START_TOKEN#" : P "END_TOKEN :&END_TOKEN#" : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(WIN01, &FILE_NAME#) : SET &HND1# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW)
: PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LINE# = STR_TRIM(&LINE#) : IF &LINE# EQ &START_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# EQ 1 !: PRINT "&LINE#" : SET &NODE# = STR_CAT(&NODE#,"&LINE#") : ELSE : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &LINE#) : ENDIF : IF &LINE# EQ &END_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 0 : p " Node :&NODE#" : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &NODE#) : SET &NODE# = "" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND1#,&FILE_NAME#,WIN01,LOGIN.WIN01,OVERWRITE) : IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &FILE_NAME#" : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND1# : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE
